response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, and we believe it would be a great asset to you as well. Given its worth, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. We understand its value to you might be $8,000, but we hope this offer presents a favorable opportunity for both parties. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
